oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Historic Film Includes Local Talent"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Hallelujah!"; film; Vidor, King; African Americans; newspapers; Memphis Public Library & Information Center;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: News article that announces the showing of the film "Hallelujah!" at the Memphis/Shelby County Public Library & Information Center followed by a panel discussion. Includes a photograph of Reverend Charles W. and Mrs. Georgia Woodruff Carter.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Donated by Rubye Woodruff Carter; Manuscript collection processed by Heather Tankersley;
